title: Introduction to Computer Graphics
description: Comprehensive study of computer graphics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Principles of Database Systems
description: Comprehensive study of database systems with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Algorithms
description: In-depth analysis of algorithms principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Applied Algorithms
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of algorithms. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Advanced Web Development
description: Advanced exploration of web development covering current research and industry practices.

title: Advanced Programming
description: Rigorous treatment of programming theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Computer Networks
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of computer networks. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Graduate Computer Networks
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in computer networks. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: MSNE 348 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Data Structures
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of data structures. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.
prerequisites: MSNE 372 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Computer Graphics
description: Rigorous treatment of computer graphics theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: MSNE 388 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Programming
description: Comprehensive study of programming with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: MSNE 305 and senior standing or graduate status
